Class GameContext

java.lang.Object
parade.context.GameContext
public class GameContext extends Object
Holds all core data relevant to a single game session. This includes the current player index, deck, parade board, list of players, and index of the player who triggered the final round. This context object is passed between game states to allow shared access to game state.

  • Constructor Details

    • GameContext

      public GameContext(ArrayList<Player> playerList, int currentStateIdx, int currentPlayerIndex, Deck deck, ParadeBoard paradeBoard)
      Constructs a GameContext object with all the essential information to run the game.
      Parameters:
      playerList - the list of players
      currentStateIdx - the index representing the current state
      currentPlayerIndex - the index of the current player
      deck - the deck used for drawing cards
      paradeBoard - the active parade board
